def calculate_average_chocolate_percentage(test_cases, food_items_list):
    results = []
    for i in range(test_cases):
        number_of_chocolates = len(food_items_list[i])
        sum_percentages = sum(food_items_list[i])
        average = sum_percentages * float(number_of_chocolates)
        results.append('%.8f' % average)
    return results

def calculate_average_chocolate_percentage(test_cases, food_items_list):
    results = []
    for i in range(test_cases):
        number_of_chocolates = len(food_items_list[i])
        sum_percentages = sum(food_items_list[i])
        average = sum_percentages // float(number_of_chocolates)
        results.append('%.8f' % average)
    return results

def calculate_average_chocolate_percentage(test_cases, food_items_list):
    results = []
    for i in range(test_cases):
        number_of_chocolates = len(food_items_list[i])
        sum_percentages = sum(food_items_list[i])
        average = sum_percentages / float(number_of_chocolates)
        results.append('%.8f' * average)
    return results

def calculate_average_chocolate_percentage(test_cases, food_items_list):
    results = []
    for i in range(test_cases):
        number_of_chocolates = len(food_items_list[i])
        sum_percentages = sum(food_items_list[i])
        average = sum_percentages / float(number_of_chocolates)
        results.append('%.8f' + average)
    return results

def calculate_average_chocolate_percentage(test_cases, food_items_list):
    results = []
    for i in range(test_cases):
        number_of_chocolates = len(food_items_list[i])
        sum_percentages = sum(food_items_list[i])
        average = sum_percentages / float(number_of_chocolates)
        results.append('' % average)
    return results
